name: Lada Car Soccer
description:
Play car soccer with these vintage cars! You can play splitscreen with one keyboard, against the AI, or watch AI cars play. Collect the boosters to make your car faster!

Car controls:

Left player: use WASD to move, CAPS-LOCK to engage booster

Right player: use arrow keys to move, right CTRL to engage booster

Other controls:

Home: reset cars and add a new ball

End: reset the score to 0-0

Mouse wheel: zoom the camera in or out

Made as a hobby project to learn programming in Godot. Images from OpenGameArt.org
